name: vaultls
description: VaulTLS is a self-hosted tool for managing TLS certificates via HashiCorp Vault, automating issuance and renewal for services through CLI commands and scripts.

features.title: Vault Integration
features.description: Manage TLS certificates using HashiCorp Vault as the backend

features.title: Automated Issuance
features.description: Request and issue certificates automatically through Vault PKI

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Automatically renew certificates before expiration to prevent outages

features.title: Cli Interface
features.description: Manage certificates through command-line tools for scripting and automation

features.title: Certificate Deployment
features.description: Deploy certificates to services automatically after issuance

features.title: Multiple Cas
features.description: Support multiple certificate authorities and PKI backends

features.title: Private Pki
features.description: Run your own private PKI infrastructure for internal services

features.title: Certificate Monitoring
features.description: Track certificate expiration dates and renewal status
